data.comment: The match has started at Morumbí.
Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
In the minute 4, Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a free kick to Sao Paulo just outside Goias's area.
Vitor Bueno of Sao Paulo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Sao Paulo push upfield but Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 6, Throw-in high up the field for Sao Paulo in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Goias.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior.
In the minute 8, Sao Paulo drives forward and Igor Gomes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior.
In the minute 10, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Luan for Sao Paulo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Luan is back on his feet again.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a Goias throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
In the minute 11, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
In the minute 13, Sao Paulo's Reinaldo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Goias defender.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 15, Throw-in Goias.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Vinicius Lopes (Goias) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 21, Goal! Fernandao gives Goias a 0-1 lead.
Great play from Vinicius Lopes to set up the goal.
Goal kick for Goias at Morumbí.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Goias at Morumbí.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Goias.
Goal! Sao Paulo draw level to 1-1 through a Brenner header.
In the minute 26, That's a fine assist from Juanfran.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Goias's half.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior awards Goias a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Goias.
In the minute 29, Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a free kick to Sao Paulo.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Goias needs to be cautious. Sao Paulo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Can Goias capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sao Paulo's half?
Free kick Sao Paulo.
In the minute 34, Sao Paulo's Igor Gomes gets in a shot on goal at Morumbí. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Breno for Goias gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Sao Paulo pushes forward through Brenner, whose finish on goal is saved.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior.
Sao Paulo's Vitor Bueno is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 37, Free kick Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
In the minute 40, Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior awards the home team a throw-in.
Sao Paulo's Luciano gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Attention is being given to Goias’s Fernandao and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 45, 7 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Goias's Fernandao is back in action after a slight knock.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Goias in the half of Sao Paulo.
Vinicius Lopes has recovered and rejoins the match in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 45, Goias to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Goias in the half of Sao Paulo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Goias.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
The first half has been concluded at Morumbí.
Vinicius Lopes is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Morumbí.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a free kick to Goias.
Corner awarded to Goias.
In the minute 48, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Goias at Morumbí.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Sao Paulo's Reinaldo is on target but unsuccessful.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior.
Goias have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a free kick to Goias.
In the minute 56, Goias’s Vinicius Lopes is on his feet again at Morumbí.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Vinicius Lopes.
Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
In the minute 58, Sao Paulo are pushing forward but Brenner's finish is wide of the goal.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior awards Goias a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Fernando Diniz (Sao Paulo) is making a first substitution, with Hernanes replacing Vitor Bueno.
The home team have replaced Diego with Pablo Felipe. This is the second substitution made today by Fernando Diniz.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a Goias throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
In the minute 61, In Sao Paulo, Hernanes of Sao Paulo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Goal kick for Goias at Morumbí.
Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sao Paulo's half?
In the minute 62, Goias's Fernandao attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 63, In Sao Paulo Sao Paulo attack through Bruno Alves. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Goias at Morumbí.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a throw-in for Sao Paulo, close to Goias's area.
Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goias's Fernandao goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 67, Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Sao Paulo to check on Douglas Baggio, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 69, Rafael Moura is replacing Fernandao for Goias at Morumbí.
Throw-in for Goias in the half of Sao Paulo.
Douglas Baggio for Goias is back on the field again.
In the minute 70, Free kick Sao Paulo.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Goias.
In the minute 72, Sao Paulo have a dangerous throw-in.
Douglas Baggio is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo close to the penalty box.
Free kick Sao Paulo.
In the minute 74, Douglas Baggio returns to the field for Goias after picking up a slight injury.
The home team replace Juanfran with Igor Vinicius.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 75, Enderson Moreira is making the team's second substitution at Morumbí with Sandro replacing Gilberto.
Victor Andrade (Goias) has replaced the possibly injured Douglas Baggio.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
In the minute 78, Goias make their fourth substitution with Heron replacing Chico.
Sao Paulo take a 2-1 lead thanks to Igor Gomes.
Brenner with an assist there.
In the minute 82, Corner awarded to Goias.
Goias advance rapidly upfield but Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior blows for offside.
Gabriel for Sao Paulo has been booked by Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 84, Rodrigo Nestor is replacing Gabriel for the home team.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a free kick to Goias.
Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 85, Robert Arboleda is on a sub for Brenner for Sao Paulo.
Goias to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 87, Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
At Morumbí, Luan has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 87, Goias's Breno has been booked in Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior awards Goias a goal kick.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Sao Paulo.
Can Goias capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sao Paulo's half?
Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sao Paulo's half?
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Throw-in Goias.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a throw-in for Sao Paulo, close to Goias's area.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Goias's half.
Goal kick for Goias at Morumbí.
Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
Breno in Goias has been yellow-carded a second time by Gilberto Rodrigues Castro Junior and is being sent off.
